page.title: 10Roller Disco.
page.content: The Roller Disco is on every Friday night at the Sports Centre, it starts at 8.00pm. and goes on till 10.00pm. It is great fun for any age and it is 60p every week, there is also refreshments on sale inside. Anybody is welcome to go and even sometimes they have fancy dress parties. Dont worry if you haven't got any skates because you can hire them for the same price. Also there are alot of other things that go on in the Sports Centre like plays at Babminton or table tennis. If you go you will probably enjoy it.
